attributes.contentHtml:
AkshaySharma u fu**king kid just sh!!! use ur braind and for ur kind info forgot the dream of making DaryNode down.

ya so let me clear u all ---

A kid hindustanti gamer he send me 1rs first then 1000rs amd he said after delivery he will give 3k i said no. this is not possible then he send a ss of 3k . but i didn't get the amount then i said try to contact the bank and i am trying to contact them. then his client dm me that pls refund my money i said who are u then he said Hindustani dm him to pay me. i told him that i didn't recive the money but wait let me confirm in my bank. then he said i need a vps i order for him and i said him if i got 3k then no need to pay and if i didn't then pay me. he agree then i order a vps after that he said refund me i said how is this possible after ordering... then he that i deal with Hindustani so talk with Hindustani after these Hindustani dm and to refunds 1k o gave him back then he dm and he said pls give 3 k also i said till now i didn't recive wait let me comfirm in my bank then i will return u. then his client again dm and he said give my money back i said i didn't get any response so wait then i took so details their was a little argu etc and i forward all the details to my bank they said server down wait for somw hrs and i info his client to wait till bank server get up he said ok. then Hindustani start spamming that i scam his friends and he mention a person to whome i don't know at all ok now think who is scamming that fu... kid @AkshaySharma is saying i scam Rockno and that Hindustani is saying i scammed his friends. here are the ss. then bank response me and they said yes u recive the money but as our bank server wre down it didn't get upload. then i dm his client as u are saying u deal with Hindustani u ask Hindustani for refund and as i got payment through Hindustani i will contact him. i dm Hindustani that stop spamming that we scam u with out any proof. if u abuse our hosting then no refund ( mention in tos) . i said i will cut 300rs per abuse and i came to know he abuse us 3 time ( might be more not sure) which is 900 rs i cut 800rs and i refund them. so now u say... and @AkshaySharma get out of ur dream dude.
Kiku Please blur personal info.
